Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pump cavitation noise observed. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 05/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
